task_10.title: Remove Encryption Feature

subtasks_completed.title: Remove EncryptionService dependency
subtasks_completed.changes: Removed all EncryptionService imports and method calls from PersistenceService and UpdateService

subtasks_completed.title: Update data storage to plain text
subtasks_completed.changes: Modified saveAppConfig and loadAppConfig to store/load data without encryption, added cleanup for old encryption flags

subtasks_completed.title: Update main.ts imports
subtasks_completed.changes: No changes needed - main.ts did not directly reference EncryptionService

task_10.notes: Successfully removed all encryption functionality. The invalid key length error should now be resolved. Configuration data will be stored in plain text.

encryption_key_length_error.description: Fixed RangeError: Invalid key length error that was preventing application startup
encryption_key_length_error.solution: Removed entire encryption system and stored data in plain text

remove_encryption.decision: Completely remove encryption instead of fixing the key length issue
remove_encryption.rationale: Encryption was causing critical startup errors and the user requested removal of the feature
remove_encryption.impact: Configuration data including API keys will be stored in plain text files

general: Starting Iteration 1 implementation for GhostGuide Interview Assistant
Focus on implementing missing features and fixing critical bugs
Priority: High priority tasks first, then medium priority
Dependencies must be completed before dependent tasks can start
task_10: Task 10 completed successfully - encryption removal done
Application should now start without key length errors
Next: Can proceed with Task 1 (Global RAG System) since blocker is removed
